item.title: Kernel prepatch 6.18-rc4
item.description: Linus has released 6.18-rc4 for testing. "Last week in fact felt *so* calm that I was surprised to notice that rc4 isn't really smaller than usual: all the stats look very normal, both in number of changes and where the changes are."
